description: This file initializes a PDF knowledge base with sample CV documents, sets up a LanceDB vector database, and performs a filtered query using an agent. It includes downloading sample data, configuring metadata for filtering, and executing a knowledge query.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing the LanceDB vector database used for storing and querying document embeddings.

classes.name: PDFKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class for managing a collection of PDF documents with associated metadata, stored in a vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class that performs knowledge-based queries and responses, integrating the knowledge base and search capabilities.

methods.name: download_knowledge_filters_sample_data
methods.description: Downloads sample PDF files for testing and populates the list of their file paths.
